column1: 272199,Gambling Counsellor,,"Collaborate with other professionals to assess client needs or plan treatments
column3: Monitor clients to evaluate treatment progress
column5: Supervise workers providing client or patient services
column7: Develop treatment plans for patients or clients
column13: Advocate for individual or community needs
column15: Modify treatment plans to accommodate client needs
column17: Intervene in crisis situations to assist clients
column19: Counsel family members of clients or patients
column21: Present social services program information to the public
column23: Refer clients to community or social service programs
column25: Interview clients to gather information about their backgrounds, needs or progress
column27: Collaborate with other professionals to develop education or assistance programs
column29: Evaluate the effectiveness of counselling or educational programs
column31: Plan programs to address community health issues
column33: Confer with family members to discuss client treatment plans or progress
column37: Maintain a working understanding of the cultural, diversity and accessibility needs of others, and how this applies to the role
column39: Support individuals with diverse needs to understand, access and utilise information or services",nan
